about_the_game:
Original soundtrack from the ☵ HIRAETH game by our Portugal composer João “Drake” Paulo.

The soundtrack includes the game's theme songs, background music, and promotional tracks. However, it does not contain event compositions which, without the context of the event, would not fit into an album to be listened to outside the game.

☵ HIRAETH features a haunting, atmospheric score, as electronic beats and synthetic effects capture the futuristic setting and planetary desolation. We are excited to share the beautiful score as you await the upcoming release of the game.

A few words from composer – João “Drake” Paulo


☵ HIRAETH is about survival and understanding the complexities of humanity. This served as my inspiration and what the soundtrack aims to express. Whether you're anxious because of a dangerous situation or feeling joyous due to life saving comforts, I immersed myself in those feelings before crafting each track. Besides giving me new experiences and helping me grow professionally, I personally really enjoyed this style of composition. It was a pleasure creating the musical journey the player will experience in this wonderful game!
